channel.title: technology on Atharva Shah
channel.description: Recent content in technology on Atharva Shah

item.title: A Comprehensive Guide to Testing Django Applications
item.description: Best Practices and Strategies for Testing Django Applications. Everything from setting up the testing environment to mastering unit testing, integration testing, and end-to-end testing.

item.title: Setting Up CI/CD to Netlify for Static Sites via Github
item.description: A step-by-step beginner friendly guide to setting up CI/CD to Netlify for static sites like Hugo, Jekyll, etc. Code snippets for Github actions included.

item.title: UML Diagrams with ChatGPT: Step-by-Step Tutorial
item.description: 5 Step process to use ChatGPT to generate UML diagrams for your projects in just a few clicks. Easy to follow instructions with visual illustrations.

item.title: Accelerating into the Future: e/acc Ruminations
item.description: A long form essay on Navigating the Intersection of Technology and Humanity through the Lens of Accelerationism.
